    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class consists of the methods and options which are available for customer.

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)

      • firstTimeBuyCheck

        public boolean firstTimeBuyCheck(long couponId)
        This method checks if a customer already has the same coupon in his possession. If not exception will occur and customer will be able to proceed with his purchase.

      • amountCheck

        public boolean amountCheck(long couponID)
        This method checks amount of the given coupons that are still available to purchase. If there are available it changes amount accordingly.
